NOT_FOUND_PAGE.404_2: Do not panic, we can help you.

SECURITY_CODE_MANDATORY: Security code is required for create an operator account
WEBAPPMODE_CLOSED_MESSAGE: The interface is closed, please wait.

PLAYLIST_HEADER.REFRESH_LIBRARY_BANNER: The library criterias have changed, please <1>refresh</1> it.

ADVANCED.ADD_ALL: Add all songs to the other list

KARA_MENU.TRANSFER_SELECT_KARA_AFTER_PLAYING: Transfer it after the currently playing song
KARA_MENU.FREE: Free this song from user's quota
KARA_MENU.TRANSFER_KARA_AFTER_PLAYING: Transfer it after the currently playing song

CRITERIA.TYPE_SMART_DESC: The "OR" type is better suited for a blacklist. "AND" for classic playlists
CRITERIA.CRITERIA_DESC: Select and add criteria to automatically include specific songs.

LABEL.YEAR: Songs from year {{year}} are in the list.
LABEL.AFTER_YEAR: Songs after year {{year}} are in the list.
LABEL.BEFORE_YEAR: Songs before year {{year}} are in the list.
LABEL.KID: This song is in the list.
LABEL.LONGER: Songs longer than {{time}} seconds are in the list.
LABEL.SHORTER: Songs shorter than {{time}} seconds are in the list.

CRITERIA.EXPL: Smart playlists are created from <1>criteria</1>, you can also manually add songs to this list.
CRITERIA.EXPL_OPEN: This is the criteria used to generate <1>the playlist</1>, it will be refreshed automatically whenever new songs are added to the database.

PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.RESTRICTED_DESCRIPTION: Karaoke is in restricted mode, you can't add songs.
PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.QUOTA_KARA_DESCRIPTION_one: You can only suggest {{count}} song. You'll be able to suggest songs again once the operator has accepted or refused your suggestions or when your song is played on screen.
PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.QUOTA_KARA_DESCRIPTION_other: You can only suggest {{count}} songs. You will be able to suggest again once the operator has added (or not added) your suggestion or when your song is played back on the screen.
PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.QUOTA_TIME_DESCRIPTION: You can only suggest {{time}} of song time. You will be able to suggest more once the operator has accepted or refused your suggestion or when your song is played on screen.

LYRICS_EXPL.LINES: Current song lyrics will be displayed here.
LYRICS_EXPL.CURRENT: The bold line indicates the currently sung line.

PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.KARA_VERSIONS: This song is available in {{length}} versions, choose the one you want to add.

AUTOMIX_MODAL.TITLE: Create an AutoMix
AUTOMIX_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: An AutoMix is a playlist created with criteria and a duration. Unlike smart playlists, this list will not be updated automatically. For a song to be included in the list, a single criteria has to match.
AUTOMIX_MODAL.NAME: Playlist name
AUTOMIX_MODAL.IS_ADMIN_PLAYER: This playlist is for a quiz, don't show it to me.

CL_ADD_RANDOM_TITLE: How many random songs do you want to add?
CL_DELETE_CRITERIAS_PLAYLIST: Delete '{{type}}' criteria  that contains all these songs :
GOTO_TOP: Go to top of the playlist
GOTO_BOTTOM: Go to bottom of the playlist

LOG_OFFLINE.TITLE: Offline Mode
LOG_OFFLINE.MESSAGE: Changes to your profile will not be saved permanently

CONFIRM_FAV_IMPORT: Overwrite your favorites with this import?
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA_ADMIN: to the opposite playlist, right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_ADD_SELECT_KARA: Add selected songs to the playlist - right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_KARA_ALREADY_ADDED: This song is already present in the opposite playlist.
TOOLTIP_ACCEPT_KARA: Accept song (free song and copy to current list)
TOOLTIP_ACCEPT_SELECT_KARA: Accept songs (free songs and copy to current list)

SETTINGS.SYSTEMPANEL_TIP: You can't find the options you seek? <2>Some options are in the <3>system panel</3>.</2>

PLAYER.LABEL: Player
PLAYER.ALWAYS_ON_TOP_TOOLTIP: If checked, the player window will always be above the others on the screen
PLAYER.FULLSCREEN_TOOLTIP: Press F on a fullscreen player to reduce it to windowed mode.
PLAYER.VIDEO_SIZE_TOOLTIP: Size of the player window : {{value}}. Any change will trigger a player restart after the current song ends if one is playing.
PLAYER.VIDEO_POSITION_X_TOOLTIP: Where the player window will be located on screen at startup
PLAYER.VIDEO_POSITION_Y_TOOLTIP: Where the player window will be located on screen at startup
PLAYER.AUDIO_DEVICE_TOOLTIP: Select an audio output device. If you don't know, leave it on "Autoselect device". This is useful if you want to output the player audio on a different sound device than your main one.
PLAYER.AUDIO_DELAY_TOOLTIP: Add a delay to the audio or video to synchronize the player on your playback device. This is useful when using a bluetooth speaker or a wireless monitor that doesn't play audio and video synchronized
PLAYER.MONITOR_NUMBER_TOOLTIP: Screen on which Karaoke Mugen will be displayed at startup
PLAYER.WINDOWBORDERS: Enable borders on the player window
PLAYER.WINDOWBORDERS_TOOLTIP: Disabling them won't disable them for the monitor, where they're always enabled.
PLAYER.PLAYER_MONITOR_TOOLTIP: Displays a second window for the operator if he cannot see the main screen directly
PLAYER.DISPLAY_RANDOMQUOTES_TOOLTIP: Random quotes are displayed at the bottom of the player screen when it is stopped
PLAYER.DISPLAY_CONNECTION_INFO_HOST_TOOLTIP: If your IP address is incorrectly detected by Karaoke Mugen, you can force it here.
PLAYER.DISPLAY_CONNECTION_INFO_QRCODE_TOOLTIP: The QRCode will be displayed on the upper-right part of the pause and stop screens.
PLAYER.DISPLAY_CONNECTION_INFO_MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: Customize the message displayed on screen, to encourage your audience or give them more information. Use $url to display this karaoke session's URL. Like this: "Go to $url!"
PLAYER.DISPLAY_NICKNAME_TOOLTIP: Shows at the bottom of the screen at the start and end of a song
PLAYER.DISPLAY_AVATAR_TOOLTIP: The song requester's avatar will be displayed at the beginning and the end of the song in the lower right corner of the player's screen.
PLAYER.DISPLAY_SONGINFO_TOOLTIP: Information (title, series/singer, etc.) are displayed at the beginning and end of a song, as well as during pause screens in Stream/Classic modes. Disable to hide these, for blind tests for example.
PLAYER.LIVE_COMMENTS_TOOLTIP: Your Twitch chat's messages will be shown on the player (Please configure your AutoMod properly).
PLAYER.BLUR_VIDEO_ON_WARNING_TAG_TOOLTIP: Apply blur filter to videos with a warning tag that are potentially unsafe. This could cause stutters on less powerful computers.

KARAOKE.LABEL: Karaoke
KARAOKE.QUOTA_TYPE_TOOLTIP: Quota helps prevent users from adding too many songs at once
KARAOKE.SONGS_BY_USER_TOOLTIP: Number of songs a user can request simultaneously. A freed or already played song no longer counts towards the quota
KARAOKE.FREE_AUTO_TIME: Songs are freed from quota after (min)
KARAOKE.FREE_AUTO_TIME_TOOLTIP: After X minutes, the song will no longer count towards the user's quota. Adjust this according to the number of guests participating
KARAOKE.FREE_ACCEPTED_SONGS_TOOLTIP: Songs will be freed when accepted by an operator from the public playlist. The song requester will regain quota.
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES: Allow users to upvote songs to free them
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_TOOLTIP: If enough people like a song suggestion, it won't count anymore in the requester's quota
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDMIN: Minimum votes required to free a song
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDMIN_TOOLTIP: Change this depending on the number of users connected
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDPERCENT: Percentage of upvotes / online users required to free a song
KARAOKE.FREE_UPVOTES_REQUIREDPERCENT_TOOLTIP: Percentage of the number of logged in users
KARAOKE.AUTOPLAY_TOOLTIP: Autoplay begins as soon as a song is added to the playlist
KARAOKE.ALLOW_DUPLICATES: Allow duplicate songs in playlists (operator only)
KARAOKE.ALLOW_DUPLICATES_TOOLTIP: With this option, a playlist can contain the same song twice (or more). Only operators can add the same song more than once to a playlist.
KARAOKE.ALLOW_PUBLIC_DUPLICATES_TOOLTIP: Allow or not the public to add a song multiple times. A user can't add a song they already added themselves, but can add one another user added before. "Upvotes" means users cannot add duplicates but can upvote songs already present. "Allowed" is usually good for Classic karaoke, "Upvotes" for Public karaoke.
KARAOKE.MEDIAS_SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Intros, Sponsors, Jingles, Encores and Outros
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTERENDMESSAGE: Display an on-screen message regularly to invite users to add a song when randomly playing song after the current playlist ended
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTERENDMESSAGE_TOOL: The message will be displayed at the center of the screen when Karaoke Mugen will play random songs, inviting users to add songs to the playlist
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_INTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Intro videos are played only once if you start playing the first song of the current playlist. A sponsor jingle video follows, if available.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_OUTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Outro videos are played only once after the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_ENCORES_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: This video will play before the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_SPONSORS_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Sponsors are played every X songs, as well as after the intro video if enabled
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_JINGLES_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Jingles are played every X songs
KARAOKE.CLASSIC_MODE_TOOLTIP: A pause will take place between each song and the name of the next song as well as its requester will be shown on screen. The song's requester or operator will be able to start song playback
KARAOKE.CLASSIC_MODE_LOCKED: Disable Stream Pause in Stream options to use Classic Karaoke Mode.
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN: Visibility for songs added by the operator
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_TOOLTIP: Should songs added by the operator be visible to the public or considered mystery songs?
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC_TOOLTIP: Should songs added by the public be visible to the public or considered mystery songs?
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_ON: Songs will be added as mystery songs (you can define the song labels in settings)
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_OFF: Songs will be added normally (visible to the public)
KARAOKE.LABELS_MYSTERY_SONGS_TOOLTIP: You can customize how mystery songs are shown to the public
KARAOKE.STREAM_MODE_TOOLTIP: A pause (with a configurable duration) will happen between each song.
KARAOKE.STREAM_MODE_LOCKED: Disable Classic Karaoke Mode in Karaoke modes to use Stream Pause.
KARAOKE.STREAMER_MODE_LABEL: Karaoke Mugen is writing text files that you can use in your streaming software, to create a custom overlay.
KARAOKE.STREAM_PAUSE_DURATION_TOOLTIP: In seconds, 0 for infinite (press play to start next song)
KARAOKE.STREAM_TWITCH_TOOLTIP: Adds commands to vote during polls, or get the currently playing song with !song
KARAOKE.STREAM_TWITCH_OAUTH_TOKEN_GET: Get your OAuth Token Twitch here
KARAOKE.MINUTES_BEFORE_SESSION_ENDS_WARNING: Show warning X minutes before end of playlist
KARAOKE.MINUTES_BEFORE_SESSION_ENDS_WARNING_TOOL: A notification will warn you X minutes before the end of your planned session
KARAOKE.ENABLE_AUTOBALANCE_TOOLTIP: The playlist will be reorganized regularly so that user requests take turns.
KARAOKE.ONLINE_SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Connect your karaoke to the Internet to let the world choose songs for you!
KARAOKE.MYSTERY_SONG_SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Hide songs from the public, for surprises!
KARAOKE.HIDE_INVISIBLE_SONGS_TOOLTIP: The way mystery songs are displayed to the public. Best for surprises!
KARAOKE.SONGPOLL_TOOLTIP: A poll will happen at the beginning of each song on your users' devices or on Twitch chat. In Stream mode, the poll will happen during pauses
KARAOKE.SONGPOLLCHOICES: Number of songs users can choose from during public poll
KARAOKE.SONGPOLLCHOICES_TOOLTIP: Each choice will be selected from the suggestion playlist
KARAOKE.SONGPOLLTIMEOUT_TOOLTIP: In seconds. It's better if it's lower than the Stream mode's pause timer!
KARAOKE.REMOTE_TOOLTIP: Enable this to allow your friends to suggest songs on your karaoke session!

PLAYLIST.PLAYLIST_SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Change the behavior of playlists, allow duplicates, choose the end-of-playlist action.

ENDOFPLAYLISTACTION.NAME: End of playlist action
ENDOFPLAYLISTACTION.TOOLTIP: If you choose Random Songs, they'll be picked from your song library. Combined with AutoPlay, your playlist can resume as soon as someone adds a new song.

OPTIONS.RANDOM: Play random songs from the library
OPTIONS.RANDOM_FALLBACK: Play random songs from the fallback playlist

INTERFACE.LABEL: Interface
INTERFACE.ALLOW_GUEST_LOGIN_TOOLTIP: If disabled, a (local or online) account will be required to log into your instance
INTERFACE.ALLOW_USER_CREATION_TOOLTIP: If disabled, users will not be able to create new local accounts, or login with an online account that isn't already registered on your Karaoke Mugen application.
INTERFACE.REQUIRE_USER_CREATION_CODE_TOOLTIP: Users will require a code to create new accounts that only operators can see and communicate to them. The code is displayed in the Users window in the K menu.
INTERFACE.ALLOW_CUSTOM_TEMPORARY_GUESTS_TOOLTIP: Allow guests to choose their nickname, rather than being subjected to a name chosen at random by the application.
INTERFACE.WEBAPPMODE_TOOLTIP: What your guests will see when they log into the interface
INTERFACE.SHOW_AVATARS_ON_PLAYLIST_TOOLTIP: To see who added what at a glance.
INTERFACE.PUBLIC_PLAYER_CONTROLS: Allow public to control the player
INTERFACE.PUBLIC_PLAYER_CONTROLS_TOOLTIP: Play/pause, stop, previosu and next controls will be visible in the public interface, allowing users to control the player from their devices. Use only in small groups!
INTERFACE.DISPLAY_WELCOME_MESSAGE_TOOLTIP: This message will be shown on your karaoke session's login page

KARA_PAUSED_TAGLINES: We will follow up on your call.
Your waiting time is estimated to some minutes.
Too calm, I don't like this…
ENCORES_TAGLINES: Well, it's not because I like you or anything…
Last song, let's give it our all!
QUOTA_AVAILABLE: You can add songs again now!
REMOTE_RESET_TOOLTIP: Generates a new token, you will lose your room code.
REMOTE_RESET_CONFIRM: Your room code will be freed and a new one will be generated for you, are you sure?
VIEW_LIKES_TOOLTIP: The song with the most likes will be shown first, this does not change the playlist order.
KARA_SUGGESTION_NOT_FOUND: Can't find your favorite song? Check your configured online repositories as well as the suggestions site if your wish has not already been granted:
REPO_IN_PROGRESS: Karaoke Mugen isn't quite ready, please wait for the following tasks to end.

ONLINE_STATS.TITLE: Stats
ONLINE_STATS.INTRO: Karaoke Mugen can send anonymous information about your instance to Karaoke Mugen Server to create usage statistics.

DETAILS.2: Which karaokes got requested (but not by whom)
DETAILS.3: Information about the computer (CPU, available RAM, OS name and version…)
DETAILS.4: Application settings (excluding any private information like passwords or keys)
DETAILS.TITLE: Sent information details
DETAILS.OUTRO: Stats are sent at each startup, then at each hour of use. You can read the information sent in the Karaoke Mugen log directory.

ONLINE_STATS.CHANGE: You can change your choice at any time from the options.
ONLINE_STATS.QUESTION: Do you agree to send these statistics to Karaoke Mugen Server?
ONLINE_STATS.ERROR: Karaoke Mugen may send information about your instance to Sentry.io during errors. This helps us solve them as they come up much faster. Do you agree to send these error reports?

SELECT_KARAS_REQUIRED: You have to select at least one song
MAKE_ACCOUNT_ADMIN_MESSAGE: If you want to upgrade your account to operator, input the 6-numbers security code here.
USER_SONG_PLAYS_IN: Your song {{kara}} has been added and will be airing in {{time}} ({{date}})

UNKNOW_REPOS.TITLE: Unknown repositories detected
UNKNOW_REPOS.DESCRIPTION: This playlist contains songs from repositories you do not have yet locally.
UNKNOW_REPOS.DOWNLOAD_THEM: Do you want to add them now?

PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL.TITLE: Warning!
PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: You pressed Play, but the current playlist '<1>{{playlist}}</1>' isn't displayed on screen.
PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL.DESC_OUTCOME: If you proceed, Karaoke Mugen will play song <1>{{song}}</1> from that playlist, but NOT from the playlist you were looking at.
PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL.CHANGE_TO_DISPLAYED_AND_PLAY: Change current playlist to <1>{{displayedPlaylistName}}</1> and play

PROFILE_MODAL.ONLINE_DELETE_WARN: This will remove your account from the online server @{{instance}}. Are you sure you want to do this?
PROFILE_MODAL.LOCAL_DELETE_WARN: This will remove your account from this local app only. If you have an online account, it won't be disabled. Are you sure you want to do this?
PROFILE_MODAL.MISSING_EMAIL: Warning: without email you will not be able to reset your password!
PROFILE_MODAL.FLAG_SENDSTATS: Use my favorites and song requests for stats

SHUFFLE_MODAL.TITLE: Shuffle playlist
SHUFFLE_MODAL.LABEL: Choose a shuffle method to use:
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SHUFFLE_DESC: The playlist will be shuffled randomly, without any influence applied to the mix.
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SMART_SHUFFLE_DESC: Prevents long songs or songs by the same person from following each other
SHUFFLE_MODAL.BALANCE_DESC: Reorders songs by pools of users (A-B-C, B-A-C, C-B-A, etc.)
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SORTUPVOTES_DESC: Sort by most number of likes (most popular songs first)

PLAYLIST_MODAL.NAME: Name
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CURRENT_DESC: The current list is the one read by the media player
PLAYLIST_MODAL.PUBLIC_DESC: The public list is the one receiving suggestions from the public
PLAYLIST_MODAL.SMART_DESC: Define criteria that will decide which songs are added to the playlist automatically
PLAYLIST_MODAL.BLACKLIST_DESC: The songs on this list will be hidden from users (unless they are also whitelisted)
PLAYLIST_MODAL.WHITELIST_DESC: The songs on this list will not be hidden even if they are in the blacklist too.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.FALLBACK_DESC: The songs on this list will play after a playlist ends, if enabled in settings
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_CURRENT_PLAYLIST: You cannot have no current playlist, edit the one you want to set as the new current playlist instead.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_PUBLIC: You cannot have no public playlist, edit the one you want to set as the new public playlist instead.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_SMART: You cannot remove the smart attribute from a playlist.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_BLACKLIST: You cannot have no blacklist, edit the one you want to set as the new blacklist instead.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_WHITELIST: You cannot have no whitelist, edit the one you want to set as the new whitelist instead.
PLAYLIST_MODAL.CANNOT_FALLBACK: You cannot have no fallback, edit the one you want to set as the new fallback instead.

CROP_AVATAR_MODAL.TITLE: Crop your avatar
CROP_AVATAR_MODAL.HELP: Resize the square for a perfect profile picture.

TUTORIAL.TITLE: Tutorial
TUTORIAL.WELCOME: Welcome to Karaoke Mugen! Here's what you need to know.
TUTORIAL.PLAYLIST: The screen shows two playlists. You can add a song from the left playlist to the right playlist and vice versa just by clicking on <2/>.
TUTORIAL.TITLE_CLICK: Click on the karaoke title for more information <1>(singers, songwriters, etc.)</1>.
TUTORIAL.PLAY_BUTTONS: The <1/> button plays the song immediately <3>(The <4/> button moves the playing cursor)</3>.
TUTORIAL.CHECK_CASE: Check <1/> to act on multiple songs <3>at once</3>.
TUTORIAL.ADD_TO_OTHER_PLAYLIST: The <1/> button adds the song to the other playlist.
TUTORIAL.WRENCH_BUTTON: The wrench <1/> allows other actions on a song.
TUTORIAL.KARAOKE_PLAYED: Lines with an <1><2/> orange</1> icon means this song has been recently played.
TUTORIAL.KARAOKE_PLAYING: The line with a <1>blue</1> background means the song is selected for playback.
TUTORIAL.CREATE_PLAYLIST_BUTTON: Create and edit your playlists from the actions menu
TUTORIAL.SELECT_PLAYLIST_BUTTON: Playlists are available in the selector :
TUTORIAL.LIBRARY: The library shows all available karaoke songs.
TUTORIAL.PLAYLIST_ATTRIBUTES: When you create a playlist, you can set it as <1>current</1> and/or <3>public</3>.
TUTORIAL.CURRENT_DESC: The <1>current</1> playlist is the one used by the player.
TUTORIAL.PUBLIC_DESC: The <1>public</1> playlist is where your users' requests are.
TUTORIAL.CURRENT_PUBLIC_DESC: The <1>current</1> and <3>public</3> playlist can be the same.
TUTORIAL.BLACKLIST_DESC: The blacklist contains all excluded songs.
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_BAR: The Karaoke Mugen Player can be controlled from the top bar.
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_CURRENT_HINT: The player will play the selected song in the <1>current playlist</1>.
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_GO_BACK: The Rewind button allows you to go back to <1>the beginning of the current</1> song.
TUTORIAL.PLAYER_STOP: The Stop button will stop playback once the current song ends. You can click on it again to stop <1>immediately</1>.
TUTORIAL.MESSAGE: You can send a message to your public (on their devices or the player screen) with the Message button.
TUTORIAL.K_MENU: The "K Menu" allows you to modify your profile and other karaoke settings.

RESTART_DOWNLOADS_MODAL.TITLE: Downloads pending
RESTART_DOWNLOADS_MODAL.LABEL: Some downloads are pending from your last session. What do you want to do?

DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.TITLE: Delete {{playlist}} forever?
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.IMPOSSIBLE: You cannot delete the only playlist.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_WHITELIST: This list is the whitelist, set another playlist as whitelist in order to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_BLACKLIST: This list is the blacklist, set another playlist as blacklist in order to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_PUBLIC: This list is the public playlist, set another playlist as public in order to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_CURRENT: This list is the current playlist, set another playlist as current in order to delete this one.
DELETE_PLAYLIST_MODAL.DELETE_CURRENT_PUBLIC: This list is defined as current and public. Set another playlsit with those attributes before deleting this one.

EXPORT_PLAYLIST_MEDIA.DONE: Playlist media files have been exported
EXPORT_PLAYLIST_MEDIA.DONE_PARTIALLY: Playlist media files have been exported, although these did fail:
EXPORT_PLAYLIST_MEDIA.NOT_ALL_MEDIA_DOWNLOADED: Not all medias are available locally. Please make sure to download all medias before exporting the playlist

STATS_MODAL.TITLE: Use my favorites and karaokes requests for stats
STATS_MODAL.DESC: We use your favorites as well as the karaokes that you have requested during a session to make usage statistics (for example, to find out the most requested karaokes).
STATS_MODAL.REFUSE_DESC: If you do not want to participate, even if it's anonymous, in these usage statistics, please let us know. If you refuse, your data will be ignored and not sent by the Karaoke Mugen Application.
STATS_MODAL.CHANGE: You can change this at any time in your profile. Do you accept usage of your song history for stats?

CLASSIC_MODE.TITLE: It's your turn to sing!
CLASSIC_MODE.TEXT: Click on the Play button to start your song.

GIT_DANGEROUS.TITLE: Dangerous actions
GIT_DANGEROUS.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the dangerous actions corner. It appears that you can mess a lot around here. Here's a quick summary of the edits detected :

STASH.DESC: Put away your edits to reuse them later.

START_QUIZ.TITLE: Start a quiz
START_QUIZ.DESCRIPTION: Pit participants against each other in a blind test! Participants will have to guess the songs playing on the screen as quickly as possible. You can set up a new game or resume an existing one.

PLAYERS.TITLE: Who's playing?
PLAYERS.DESCRIPTION: All users with their account can participate (if the interface is open), you can allow guest accounts to play or add a player representing the Twitch chat if your channel is connected.
PLAYERS.TWITCH_CHAT: Make the Twitch chat play with the name

DISPLAY.TITLE: How to display songs?
DISPLAY.DESCRIPTION: To make the task more challenging, it is possible to start the song at an advanced point instead of the beginning. It is also possible to hide the video, turn off the sound, and/or not display the subtitles.

ANSWERS.TITLE: Accepted answers
ANSWERS.DESCRIPTION: You can choose which answers are accepted (titles, singers, series, etc…) and how many points each answer type players earn for a good answer. You can also define a tolerance for typos. An auto-complete is available to people using the public interface.

TIME.TITLE: Answering time
TIME.DESCRIPTION: Participants will be given time to answer. Once the timer has elapsed, the answer will be shown on screen, with sound, lyrics, and video enabled. A quick answer can award more points if the option is enabled.

STOP_QUIZ.TITLE: Stop quiz?
STOP_QUIZ.DESCRIPTION: The game will be stopped immediately. It can be resumed using the Start a quiz menu.

SETUP_PAGE.TITLE: Setup Wizard
SETUP_PAGE.NEED_ACCOUNT: Before you can start singing, you'll need an account to use the app.
SETUP_PAGE.ACCOUNT_QUESTION: Do you want to use a local account (on your computer only) or an online account (Internet access required)?
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: An online account allows you to:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_SAVE_INFOS: Backup your favorite songs, avatar and profile info to use them on another Karaoke Mugen App.
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_LOST_PASSWORD: If you supply an email address, you'll be able to recover your account if you forget your password.
SETUP_PAGE.LOCAL_ACCOUNT_DESC: You chose a local account. Type in an account name and a password below:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE: Your online account will be hosted on the {{instance}} instance
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE_DESC: An instance is an online server providing several services to Karaoke Mugen. If you're not sure, leave the default instance ({{instance}}), or if you know what you're doing, change it to the instance of your choice.
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: I want to create a new account
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Type in an account name and a password to create one.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_DESC_CONSOLE: Please also enter the 6-digit security code that you can find by looking for "SECURITY CODE FOR THIS SESSION" in the Karaoke Mugen log file or in the console.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_USE: This code makes sure you're really the one doing these actions. It changes after each use.
SETUP_PAGE.CONNECTED_MESSAGE: Congratulations, you're logged in to Karaoke Mugen, {{user}}!
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_DESC_1: Karaoke Mugen has a default karaokes repository,
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_DESC_2: . Its media files will be downloaded as you need them.
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_QUESTION: Where do you want to store these downloads? By default they'll be in:
SETUP_PAGE.REPOSITORY_LATER: You can change this folder at any time.
SETUP_PAGE.COLLECTIONS_CHOICE_DESC_1: The Song Collections are intended for different audiences. Choose the collections you want to see in your karaoke database.
SETUP_PAGE.COLLECTIONS_CHOICE_DESC_2: You can change your collections at any time in the system panel.

ERROR.PLAYER_NO_ONLINE_MEDIA: Media cannot be read from online sources. Check your internet connection.
ERROR.PLAYER_RANDOM_SONG_AFTER_PLAYLIST: Unable to select a random song to play after playlist ends
ERROR.POLL_ALREADY_STARTED: A poll is already in progress
ERROR.POLL_PUBLIC_PL_EMPTY: Unable to start poll: public playlist is empty
ERROR.POLL_NOT_ENOUGH_SONGS: Unable to start poll: not enough songs available

INFO.POLL_WINNER: People voted for a new song!
INFO.END_OF_SESSION_NEAR: The karaoke session should end in {{data}} minutes.

LOADING_SUBTITLE: It shouldn't take too long, try to clear your cache or update your browser if you get stuck here.
LOADING_SUBTITLE_ELECTRON: It shouldn't take too long, try to restart Karaoke Mugen or update it if you get stuck here.

DESC.PARENTS: If this song is an alternative version of another one, select its parent(s) to pre-fill this form.
DESC.PARENTS_PUBLIC: When a user selects a parent song in the public interface, they'll see all their children / alternative versions.
DESC.TITLES: Set all titles the song has in different languages. Usually, there's only one title.
DESC.TITLES_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE: Default title language should be the song's original title. For titles in non-latin languages (chinese, japanese, arabic, korean…), add a "Romanization" title and make it default.
DESC.ALIASES: If the song is known as something else (abbreviations for example), set them here to help people find it through search. No need to use words already contained in the song title(s).

KARA.MEDIA_IN_PROCESS: The media file is being processed, please wait for the success notification.
KARA.MEDIA_REPOSITORY_RULES_UNMET: The media file does not meet all mandatory repository requirements. Please encode the media first.

WARNINGS.LIBAVCODEC_ENCODER: The audio is encoded with the libavcodec (ffmpeg reference aac) encoder, which can create audible artifacts and is discouraged to utilize. Please use the libfdk_aac encoder for aac or another codec like opus, to get the best possible quality.

MEDIA_ENCODE.LABEL: Encode media

OPTIONS.TRIM_MEDIA_TOOLTIP: Detect and remove black frames and silence at the beginning and end of the media

MEDIA_ENCODE.TIMING_CHANGE_WARNING: The selected options might change the start and end time of the media. Check the lyrics timings after the media is encoded and saved.
MEDIA_ENCODE.LEAVE_PAGE: Media is being encoded. Leaving the page now will will discard any progress, are you sure you want to leave?

KARA.APPLY_LYRICS_CLEANUP_TOOLTIP: Cleans lyrics file up from unused styles & comments and saves the title & author of the kara in the properties
KARA.TITLE: Titles
KARA.TITLE_TOOLTIP: If you don't know, put the name of the series here as well
KARA.ALIASES_TOOLTIP: Short names or alternative names, used for search.
KARA.SERIES_TOOLTIP: TV series, movie title, video game title, etc.
KARA.FRANCHISES_TOOLTIP: If the series is part of a franchise (like Gundam, Mario, Zelda, Naruto, etc.) indicate it here.
KARA.SERIES_SINGERS_REQUIRED: Series, Sung By or From the music band cannot be empty at the same time.
KARA.ORDER_TOOLTIP: Opening/Ending number. If this is the only opening/ending in the series, leave blank.
KARA.YEAR_TOOLTIP: Year when the series was broadcasted or the video was produced
KARA.FAMILIES_TOOLTIP: Defines what kind of content the video has.
KARA.SINGERGROUPS_TOOLTIP: If the singers belong to a music band, put them in here. The band will be displayed in the player and song lists instead of individual singers.
KARA.CREATORS_TOOLTIP: Entity that created the series. Can be animation studio, movie studio, or game studio.
KARA.KARA_AUTHORS_REQUIRED: Author of the karaoke is required
KARA.COMMENT_TOOLTIP: A commentary field for things like "To all my fans!" or "Don't modify the effects!" or "Made with lots of coffee".
KARA.IGNOREHOOKS_TOOLTIP: Some tags can be added automatically to this song if it meets some conditions.
KARA.PREVIEW_HOOKS_MODAL: The following changes will be made to the tags for this song
KARA.GROUPS_TOOLTIP: Download groups for this song. The song will be included in these download packs
KARA.VERSIONS_TOOLTIP: Versions allow a better identification of songs with the same title. If no version applies to this song because it's too specific (ex. Future Vers. or Chihaya Vers.) indicate it in its title by adding " ~Chihaya Vers." to it.
KARA.DOWNLOAD_ALL_TOOLTIP: Download all retrieved medias at once
KARA.SYNC_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: Syncing medias will remove all medias from disabled collections if they have been previously downloaded. This can delete many files if you have temporarily disabled a collection that you usually use.

BATCH_EDIT.CREATE_PLAYLIST: First, you need to create a playlist in the operator panel.

KARA.PROBLEMATIC_TOOLTIP: This song contains scenes ({{tags}}) that may be problematic for some viewers.
KARA.DELETE_ALL_TOOLTIP: Remove all displayed karaokes at once
KARA.DELETE_KARA_TITLE: You're going to remove {{count}} displayed karaokes, are you sure?
KARA.MISSING_DOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: This karaoke is not downloaded, you will need Internet in order to play it. You can make it work offline by downloading the media.
KARA.ONLINE_REPOSITORIES: Some of your karaokes are from remote repositories (kara.moe server for example), these karaokes are not editable through this interface, to make sure that the repositories stays in sync. You can check the "Maintainer mode" checkbox in the repository settings, you will not receive any updates anymore but you will be able to edit or delete karaokes.
KARA.PARENTS_TOOLTIP: If a parent is defined, this karaoke will show as alternative to the selected parent karaoke(s). Please select the right repository before filling this to avoid adding karaokes from other repositories.
KARA.COLLECTIONS_TOOLTIP: Select the collections in which the karaoke should appear
KARA.FROM_DISPLAY_TYPE_TOOLTIP: Select tag type to used when displaying the song
KARA.ANNOUNCE_POSITION_TOOLTIP: Overrides the default announce position (banner and song infos at the beginning and end of a song). Useful to prevent overlapping with the song text, if the subtitle position is different than usual.

USERS.PASSWORD_VALIDATOR_MESSAGE: A user must have a password
USERS.EDIT_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: Online users cannot be edited from this page except to change their role on this Karaoke Mugen app. To edit your own profile online, do this from the public or operator interface.

DATABASE.REGENERATE_DB_DESCRIPTION: <1>Regenerate database. Generation makes Karaoke Mugen aware of all the files you have in your data folders.</1> This is usually done when the app starts, but you may want to do this manually if : <3>You added a repository and put files inside already</3><4>You modified files from outside the app</4>
DATABASE.VALIDATE_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Validate all files in all enabled repositories to fix them if necessary. Maintainer use only.
DATABASE.DUMP_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION: Creates a karaokemugen.sql.gz backup file in your data folder. This file can be used to create a restore point or to send your database to the devs if they ask you to do so.
DATABASE.RESTORE_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION: Restores your database from the file karaokemugen.sql.gz if it's present in your data folder. <2>**WARNING : This will overwrite ALL non-saved data in your database : playlists, sessions, etc.)</2>
DATABASE.UPDATE_REPOS_DESCRIPTION: Forces a repository update, this can be useful if one of the repositories is in abnormal state.

TAGS.NAME: Internal name
TAGS.NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the internal name used to reference the tags in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.SHORT_NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the short name used in the operator interface when displaying karaoke titles
TAGS.KARAFILETAG_TOOLTIP: This will be added in the types section of karaoke file names
TAGS.TYPES_TOOLTIP: This is the tag type, so it can be properly searched for by users
TAGS.ALIASES_TOOLTIP: Short names or alternative names, used for search.
TAGS.I18N_TOOLTIP: There must be at least one name in any language (enter the original name in english if there are no others)
TAGS.ROMANIZATION_WARNING: This title/tag contains a non-Latin alphabet language. You must add the language “Latin Alphabet (Romanization)” as well unless the title in non-Latin alphabet is a transcription of another language in its entirety.
TAGS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current tag with another one
TAGS.MERGE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: Resulting tag will have the current Name and Short name. Types, Aliases and Translations will be merged and the resulting tag will contain all the information from source and destination tags.
TAGS.DELETE_TAG_MESSAGE: This will remove the tag as well as in any song in your database!
TAGS.LANG_ERROR: A tag must have at least one translated name.
TAGS.NOLIVEDOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: Songs with this tag won't be able to be downloaded from Karaoke Mugen Server
TAGS.PRIORITY_TOOLTIP: Tags with a higher value will be displayed first. 10 by default. -1 hides the tag from being displayed in public interface, -2 hides it everywhere (still used for search).
TAGS.DESCRIPTION_TOOLTIP: A description of the tag, used only for collections.
TAGS.MAL_ID_TOOLTIP: If this is an anime, please indicate its id/url on myanimelist.net
TAGS.ANILIST_ID_TOOLTIP: If this is an anime, please indicate its id/url on anilist.co
TAGS.KITSU_ID_TOOLTIP: If this is an anime, please indicate its url on kitsu.io
TAGS.NOT_VALID_URL_ERROR: This is not a valid url

CONFIG.MESSAGE: To modify a setting, just edit it and press enter. Not all settings are editable and will return an error if you try anyway.

PROPERTIES.APP_QUICKSTART_TOOLTIP: This disables data verification. You will have to generate your database in case of modification manually from the system panel -> database page.
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_ERRORTRACKING: Send error and crash reports (via sentry.io)
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_STATS: Send usage telemetry to Karaoke Mugen Server
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_KEYBOARDMEDIASHORTCUTS: Control the player with keyboard media keys
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_KEYBOARDMEDIASHORTCUTS_TOOLTIP: Disable if you want these keys to control another app (iTunes, foobar, etc.)
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_HARDWAREDECODING_TOOLTIP: Forces player's hardware acceleration. Note: on some configurations, it can cause unexpected behavior during playback. In such cases, select "Disabled". The "Automatic" option is the safest, and "Force" the most risky/not recommended.
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_FETCHPOPULARSONGS: Fetch popular songs from your online repositories
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_FETCHPOPULARSONGS_TOOLTIP: If disabled, popular songs will be calculated from your Karaoke Mugen app
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_DISCORD_DISPLAYACTIVITY: Show Karaoke Mugen activity on your Discord profile

SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORTED_DESC: Download session data by clicking on the following links
SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORT_PLAYED_COUNT: Songs played (grouped by number of times played)
SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORT_REQUESTED_COUNT: Songs requested (grouped by number of times played)
SESSIONS.NAME: Name
SESSIONS.TITLE: Title
SESSIONS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current session with another one

REPOSITORIES.NAME: Repository name
REPOSITORIES.TOOLTIP_NAME: If it's an online repository, put its domain name only here. If it's a local repository, name it as you want. For example 'My private little karaokes'
REPOSITORIES.SECURE_TOOLTIP: Enable HTTPS access to the repository
REPOSITORIES.UPDATE_TOOLTIP: If disabled, the application will not update the repository anymore.
REPOSITORIES.AUTO_MEDIA_DOWNLOADS_TOOLTIP: If your connection is too slow, we recommend that you select "All" so that the medias are downloaded beforehand. This is also recommended for convention use or for streams to avoid potential errors in the middle of a karaoke!
REPOSITORIES.MAINTAINER_MODE_TOOLTIP: Enable this if you participate in the repository's maintenance. The app will switch to a git-based repository. Git needs to be installed on your system.
REPOSITORIES.MOVE_TOOLTIP: This allows you to define which repositories take priority when creating your database: the highest repositories will be taken into account first if two repositories have the same karaoke
REPOSITORIES.MOVING_MEDIA_ABOUT_MESSAGE: All repository media files will be moved to the new folder. If your repository has several media folders, all files of all folders will be moved into the same target folder. If there are duplicate files, they'll be savagely overwritten.
REPOSITORIES.COMPARE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: This will allow you to compare then eventually copy lyrics files from one repository to another if they differ between the two same songs. Select a repository to compare lyrics with (it will be the destination repository when comes time to copy lyrics)
REPOSITORIES.LYRICS_ARE_DIFFERENT: These song lyrics are different between the {{first}} and {{second}} repositories:
REPOSITORIES.CONFIRM_SURE: Do you want to synchronize lyrics of repository {{second}} with those of repository {{first}}?
REPOSITORIES.SYNCHRONIZE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: This will allow you to synchronize tags files from one repository to another. Select a repository to synchronize tags with (it will be the destination repository for copied tags)
REPOSITORIES.DELETE_OLD_MEDIAS: Delete medias unused for one month
REPOSITORIES.STORAGE_INFO: There are multiple ways to manage space used by your repositories:
REPOSITORIES.STORAGE_INFO_DELETE: Like you've seen earlier, you have the ability to remove unused medias for a month or all the medias. They will be redownloaded when needed again but this will allow you to free space if you had a long karaoke night recently for example.
REPOSITORIES.STORAGE_INFO_MOVE: You also have the ability, in the repositories management page to move the files of a repository somewhere else like on an external drive, USB key or a network share, allowing you to free space on your main drive.
REPOSITORIES.NO_FREE_SPACE: Not enough disk space to download! Make space on your disk and restart the queue.
REPOSITORIES.GIT_NOTHING_TO_PUSH: No commit was generated, we'll try to push previous commits that have failed.
REPOSITORIES.GIT_STASH: You have stashes to apply, those are created automatically when a merge conflict occurs. You can try to restore them or delete them. You should check the <1>Git repository</1> online to see changes that might have caused the conflict.
REPOSITORIES.GIT_TOO_MANY_CHANGES: Looks like you're making {{changes}} changes. When making many changes that are related to the same kind of action, it's advisable to squash your commits into a big one.

HOME.SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: See logs, change configuration options, backup/restore your database, trigger a manual generation and manage karaoke session
HOME.KARAS_DESCRIPTION: List, edit, and create karaoke data files. You can also download medias and view most requested, most played, and karaoke history
HOME.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: List, create, edit tags (singers, songwriters, creators, song types, etc.)
HOME.USERS_DESCRIPTION: List, edit, create users, change their password, create new guests accounts.

TASKS.CLEANING_REPO: Cleaning of deleted songs from the repository

ERROR_CODES.DATABASE_DISK_FULL: Database disk is full! Free up some space immediately!
ERROR_CODES.USER_LOGIN_INVALID: Invalid user name. Please only use alphanumeric characters (._- are allowed too)
ERROR_CODES.USER_CREATE_ERROR_ONLINE_DISABLED: Unable to create account : online mode is disabled
ERROR_CODES.PL_DELETE_PLAYING_ERROR: You can't remove the curerntly playing song
ERROR_CODES.QUIZZ_GET_LAST_SONGS_ERROR: Error getting last songs played in the quizz
ERROR_CODES.UPDATE_REPO_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS: An update to this repository is already ongoing
ERROR_CODES.REPO_NOT_UPDATEABLE: The repository cannot be updated: it might be disabled, not in maintainer mode, offline, or its update setting is set to disabled
ERROR_CODES.TAG_REPOSITORY_INVALID_CHANGE: You can't change a tag's repository. Use the copy function instead
ERROR_CODES.INBOX_VIEW_FORBIDDEN_ERROR: You don't have permission to view the song inbox
ERROR_CODES.INBOX_VIEW_ERROR: Unable to fetch karaokes from inbox
ERROR_CODES.INBOX_DOWNLOAD_ERROR: Unable to download karaoke from inbox
ERROR_CODES.INBOX_DELETE_ERROR: Unable to delete karaoke from inbox
ERROR_CODES.WEBAPPMODE_CLOSED_API_MESSAGE: API is disabled at the moment
ERROR_CODES.C_SHORTER_THAN_CONFLICT: You cannot add a "Shorter than" criteria higher than the "Longer than" criteria.
ERROR_CODES.C_LONGER_THAN_CONFLICT: You cannot add a "Longer than" criteria lower than the "Shorter than" criteria.
ERROR_CODES.C_BEFORE_YEAR_CONFLICT: You cannot add a "Before year" criteria higher than the "After year" criteria.
ERROR_CODES.C_AFTER_YEAR_CONFLICT: You cannot add a "After year" criteria lower than the "Before year" criteria.
ERROR_CODES.PL_DELETE_UPVOTED: You cannot delete your suggestion, it's too late.
ERROR_CODES.AUTOMIX_NO_SONGS_MEET_CRITERIAS_ERROR: No songs met the criterias selected for this AutoMix
ERROR_CODES.PL_ADD_SONG_ERROR: Error adding song to a playlist
ERROR_CODES.PL_MOVE_SONG_ERROR: Unable to copy song to the destination playlist
ERROR_CODES.USER_CREATION_DISABLED: This karaoke session doesn't accept new users for now.
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_QUEUED_ERROR: Error adding downloads to the queue
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_QUEUED_ALREADY_ADDED_ERROR: No downloads added, all are already in queue or running
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_GET_ERROR: Error getting downloads from the queue
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_WIPE_ERROR: Error wiping downloads from the queue
ERROR_CODES.FAVORITES_IMPORTED_INCOMPATIBLE_VERSION_: Error importing favorites : incompatible list version
ERROR_CODES.FAVORITES_IMPORTED_WRONG_FILETYPE_ERROR: Error importing favorites : not a favorites list file
ERROR_CODES.FAVORITES_IMPORTED_BAD_DATA_ERROR: Error importing favorites : invalid data in file
ERROR_CODES.KARA_FILE_EXISTS_ERROR: Error saving files: A karaoke with the same filename already exists. Please make sure this is not a duplicate and the tags are set correctly.
ERROR_CODES.KARA_HISTORY_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by date played
ERROR_CODES.KARA_RANKING_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by most requested
ERROR_CODES.KARA_PLAYED_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by most played
ERROR_CODES.KARA_EDIT_ERROR_UNMOVABLE_LYRICS: Unable to rename lyrics. Is the file busy in another app?
ERROR_CODES.KARA_EDIT_ERROR_UNMOVABLE_MEDIA: Unable to rename media. Is the file busy in another app?
ERROR_CODES.REPOSITORY_MANIFEST_KARA_METADATA_RULE_V: Error : Karaoke metadata violates a rule from its repository. Check the Event Log for more information.
ERROR_CODES.REPOSITORY_MANIFEST_KARA_PARENTS_RULE_VI: Error : Karaoke family violates a rule from its repository. Check the Event Log for more information.
ERROR_CODES.TIME_PARADOX: Time Paradox Detected ! A song cannot be its own parent!
ERROR_CODES.PIME_TARADOX: Pime Taradox Detected ! A song's parent cannot be its own child as well!
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_ALREADY_ADD: This song has already been added.
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_QUOTA_REACH: Can't add any song, quota reached
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_BLACKLISTED: Song is blacklisted and cannot be added
ERROR_CODES.SONG_COPIED_ERROR: Error copying song to another repository
ERROR_CODES.TAG_COPIED_ERROR: Error copying tag to another repository
ERROR_CODES.CONFIG_BACKUPED_ERROR: Error during backup of configuration file
ERROR_CODES.BACKGROUND_FILE_DELETE_ERROR_IN_USE: Unable to remove file, it's in use by the player!
ERROR_CODES.USER_DELETE_ADMIN_DAMEDESU: You can't remove the admin user!
ERROR_CODES.USER_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_SING: User not allowed to start the song
ERROR_CODES.PL_LIST_ERROR: Error fetching a list of playlists
ERROR_CODES.PL_VIEW_ERROR: Error fetching info from a playlist
ERROR_CODES.TYPE_SMART_CHANGE_CONFLICTING_CRITERIAS_: Error changing smart playlist type: you have conflicting criterias (year/duration?) Remove them and retry.
ERROR_CODES.PL_SET_CURRENT_ERROR: Error setting a playlist to current
ERROR_CODES.PL_SET_PUBLIC_ERROR: Error setting a playlist to public
ERROR_CODES.PL_SONG_COPY_ERROR: Error copying a song to the destination playlist
ERROR_CODES.PL_MODIFY_CONTENT_ERROR: Error modifying content's position or playing status
ERROR_CODES.UPVOTE_NO_SELF: Unable to upvote one of your own requests
ERROR_CODES.DOWNVOTE_NO_SELF: Unable to downvote one of your own requests
ERROR_CODES.REPO_UPLOAD_MEDIA_ERROR: Error sending media to the repository
ERROR_CODES.GIT_BINARY_NOT_FOUND: Git was not found on the system, please install it to use the maintainer mode
ERROR_CODES.REPO_GIT_CHECK_ERROR: Unable to check git repository status
ERROR_CODES.REPO_PATH_ERROR_IN_APP_PATH: Repository media or base path is not allowed to be in the application's path
ERROR_CODES.REPO_PATH_ERROR_IN_BASE_PATH: Repository media path cannot be under its base path
ERROR_CODES.REPO_PATH_ERROR_IN_WINDOWS_ROOT_DIR: Repository base or media cannot be at the root of a disk drive
ERROR_CODES.SESSION_END_BEFORE_START_ERROR: Session end is before its beginning!
ERROR_CODES.USER_ASCII_CHARACTERS_ONLY: Only alphanumeric characters in your username please (you can change your nickname later to whatever you wish).
ERROR_CODES.ADMIN_CONVERT_ERROR: The "admin" account cannot be converted to an online account
ERROR_CODES.USER_RESETPASSWORD_ONLINE_ERROR: Could not reset your password: contact the the server's administrator your account belongs to.
ERROR_CODES.UPDATING_MEDIAS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to update medias properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.REPO_COMPARE_LYRICS_ERROR: Error comparing lyrics between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.REPO_SYNC_TAGS_ERROR: Error syncing tags between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.REPO_COPY_LYRICS_ERROR: Error copying lyrics between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.POLL_VOTE_ERROR: This song is not in the poll
ERROR_CODES.USER_ONLINE_NOINTERNET: You cannot edit your profile for now, your online server isn't working.
ERROR_CODES.FAVORITES_ONLINE_NOINTERNET: You cannot edit your favorites for now, your online server isn't working.
ERROR_CODES.PROBLEMATIC_SMART_PLAYLIST_ERROR: Error creating smart playlist about problematic tags
ERROR_CODES.REPO_DELETE_ALL_MEDIAS_ERROR: Error when deleting all medias from repository
ERROR_CODES.REPO_DELETE_OLD_MEDIAS_ERROR: Error when deleting older medias from repository
ERROR_CODES.REPO_GET_FREE_SPACE_ERROR: Error when getting free space for repository
ERROR_CODES.USER_CANNOT_CHANGE_TYPE: Only admins can change a user's type
ERROR_CODES.GUESTS_CANNOT_EDIT: Guests are not allowed to edit their profiles
ERROR_CODES.REPOSITORY_UNREACHABLE: Repository unreachable. Did you misspell its name?
ERROR_CODES.CANNOT_INSTALL_REPO_AT_WINDOWS_ROOT_DRIV: Repository cannot be installed at the root of a Windows drive.
ERROR_CODES.DELETE_PLAYLIST_ERROR_CURRENT: Unable to delete a current playlist. Make another playlist current first.
ERROR_CODES.DELETE_PLAYLIST_ERROR_PUBLIC: Unable to delete a public playlist. Make another playlist public first.
ERROR_CODES.DELETE_PLAYLIST_ERROR_WHITELIST: Unable to delete a whitelist. Make another playlist a whitelist first.
ERROR_CODES.DELETE_PLAYLIST_ERROR_BLACKLIST: Unable to delete a blacklist. Make another playlist a blacklist first.
ERROR_CODES.QUIZZ_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS: Unable to start quiz, one is already in progress
ERROR_CODES.LOG_VIEW_ERROR: Unable to open file explorer on log directory
ERROR_CODES.SESSION_DELETE_ACTIVE_ERROR: The active session cannot be delete.
ERROR_CODES.CANNOT_DELETE_LAST_REPOSITORY: The last repository cannot be deleted
ERROR_CODES.PLAYER_DISABLED_IN_TEST_MODE_SORRYMASEN_: Player is disabled in test mode

SUCCESS_CODES.SONG_COPIED: Successfully copied song to another repository
SUCCESS_CODES.TAG_COPIED: Successfully copied tag to another repository
SUCCESS_CODES.USER_DELETED_ONLINE: Your online account was successfully deleted
SUCCESS_CODES.USER_RESETPASSWORD_ONLINE: An email has been sent with a link to reset your password.
SUCCESS_CODES.REPO_LYRICS_COPIED: Copying lyrics between two repositories was successful
SUCCESS_CODES.STOP_AFTER: The karaoke will stop at the end of the current song. To stop now, click on the button again.

HOME.TITLE: System Panel
HOME.DESCRIPTION: This is where it all begins. Choose your action.

LOGS.TITLE: Logs
LOGS.DESCRIPTION: Everything you never wanted to know about how your karaoke works.

CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Advanced configuration
CONFIGURATION.DESCRIPTION: For experts only. All Karaoke Mugen settings are here, be careful where you put your fingers.

SESSIONS.TITLE: Session management
SESSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Add, remove, or view data from the different Karaoke sessions you have done.

REPOSITORIES.TITLE: Collections and repositories management
REPOSITORIES.DESCRIPTION_COLLECTION: The Song Collections are intended for different audiences. Choose the collections you want to see in your karaoke database.
REPOSITORIES.DESCRIPTION: Repositories are sources of karaoke. Add, enable, or remove repositories from this page.

BACKGROUNDS.TITLE: Backgrounds management
BACKGROUNDS.DESCRIPTION: Just a mean to customize your player a little bit.

UNUSED_FILES.TITLE: Unused files
UNUSED_FILES.DESCRIPTION: You can list unnecessary files (used by no karaoke) in your repositories from here.

DATABASE.TITLE: Database
DATABASE.DESCRIPTION: Database management tools. Database, database, just living in the database wow wow.

KARAOKE_LIST.TITLE: List of karaokes
KARAOKE_LIST.DESCRIPTION: From here you can edit, add or delete karaokes. Usually for karaoke repository maintainers only.

KARAOKE_NEW.TITLE: Add a karaoke
KARAOKE_NEW.DESCRIPTION: This form allows you to add an already existing karaoke to one of your repositories.

DOWNLOAD_QUEUE.TITLE: Medias download queue
DOWNLOAD_QUEUE.DESCRIPTION: See the list of current and pending downloads.

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Medias download manager
DOWNLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Find and get medias linked to karaoke from your configured repositories.

HISTORY.TITLE: Reading history
HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: Lists all the karaoke played on your application, in descending chronological order.

MOST_REQUESTED.TITLE: Most Popular Songs
MOST_REQUESTED.DESCRIPTION: Lists the most requested songs on your application. Only takes into account karaoke songs added from the public interface.
MOST_REQUESTED.DESCRIPTION_ONLINE: You're seeing the ONLINE popular song list right now. Disable the "Fetch popular songs online" setting to only see those from your instance.

MOST_PLAYED.TITLE: Most played songs
MOST_PLAYED.DESCRIPTION: List the most played songs on your application

KARATAG_BATCH_EDIT.TITLE: Bulk add / remove tag
KARATAG_BATCH_EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Maintainers only: this page allows you to add or remove a tag on several karaokes simultaneously.

TAG_LIST.TITLE: Tags list
TAG_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Maintainers only: list of tags your karaokes are made of.

TAG_NEW.TITLE: Create a tag
TAG_NEW.DESCRIPTION: Tag creation form. Remember to add an English translation at least.

TAG_EDIT.TITLE: Modify a tag
TAG_EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Tag modification form. Only the original name change results in a file name change.

TAG_DUPLICATES.TITLE: List of duplicate tags
TAG_DUPLICATES.DESCRIPTION: This page allows you to see tags that have the same name but not the same category in order to merge them if necessary.

USER_LIST.TITLE: User management
USER_LIST.DESCRIPTION: From here you can create, delete, modify users, but also reset their password or change their rights.

INBOX.TITLE: Inbox for karaokes to integrate
INBOX.DESCRIPTION: As maintainer of this karaoke base, your duty is to make this list empty.

CHIBI.ONTOP: Show on top of other windows

BACKGROUNDS_MGMT.EXPL: There are 3 categories of backgrounds. If a category doesn't have any background, a bundled one will be used (those with the character that give his name to the app version).
INFO: If you want to use the same background for 2 different categories (or more), you have to place it in each category.
You can also add music! In the same fashion, each category has its own music.

You can bind a background to a music by giving it the same name. For example, back1.jpg and back1.mp3 in the same category will always be linked. Otherwise, if back2.jpg doesn't have a sound with the same name, it will be choosed randomly.

DESC.STOP: When the player is in a stopped state.

INBOX.NAME: Karaoke name
INBOX.USER: User in charge of issue integration
INBOX.SONG_DOWNLOADED_FROM_INBOX_FAILED: Song could not be downloaded from inbox!
INBOX.DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete the karaoke from the inbox as well as its files on the server?
INBOX.NO_REPOSITORY_ENABLED: No online repository enabled in maintainer mode
INBOX.ONLINE_USER_REQUIRED: A online user is required for inbox

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: A karaoke player and a party organizer, between friends or in public. MIT-licensed.
ABOUT.CONTRIBUTORS: The karaokes were created by awesome people, like <1>{{contributors}}</1> for example.
ABOUT.DONATORS: Thanks to <1>{{donators}}</1> for their donations to Karaoke Mugen

QUIZ.CONTINUE: Continue the song after the answer reveal
QUIZ.TITLE: Quiz mode

STATES.QUICK_GUESSING_one: Answer in less than {{count}} second to get more points!
STATES.QUICK_GUESSING_other: Answer in less than {{count}} seconds to get more points!
STATES.TOO_LATE: Too late! The last answer recorded was "{{answer}}".
STATES.NICE_ONE: That's the right answer! You get $t(QUIZ.POINTS, {"count": {{points}} }).
STATES.NICE_ONE_QUICK: That's the right answer! You get $t(QUIZ.POINTS, {"count": {{points}} }) (bonus for quick answer)

RULES.TITLE: Rules
RULES.GUESS_TIME: You have <1>$t(QUIZ.RULES.SECONDS, {"count": {{seconds}} })</1> to guess the song on screen.
RULES.QUICK_ANSWER: If you guess correctly in <1>$t(QUIZ.RULES.SECONDS, {"count": {{seconds}} })</1> only, you will get <1>$t(QUIZ.BONUS_POINTS, {"count": {{points}} })</1>.
RULES.END_OF_PLAYLIST: when the playlist reaches its end
